Product description:
input_text.Response A:
These IRWIN Tools VISE-GRIP Pliers, High-Leverage Combination, 1000-Volt Insulated, 7-inch (10505873NA) are comfortable and strong! The pliers can an ream and smooth inside and outside of conduit which is ideal for liquid tight fittings and caps. Constructed from durable nickel chromium steel, Machined jaws deliver maximum gripping strength. Anti-pinch, non-slip ProTouch Grips provide comfort, control, and less hand fatigue. Handles are Red and Yellow, the international color denoting safety. Insulated pliers are rated for 1000 volts and meet ASTM, IEC, VDE and DIN specifications. Slim profile nose reaches into tight areas and grips firmly strong, hardened gripper teeth. IRWIN Tools VISE-GRIP Pliers, High-Leverage Combination, 1000-Volt Insulated, 7-inch (10505873NA)
The Irwin Tools 10505873NA- 7" Insulated Combination - High Leverage is rated up to 1000V. The pliers feature ProTouch grips that provide maximum comfort and reduced hand fatigue. The Red & Yellow handles denotes international color for safety. These pliers are designed to Securely grips and cuts work pieces.
input_text.Response B: These Vise-Grip pliers from Irwin Tools are designed for a wide range of uses, including gripping, bending, cutting, and joining wire, metal, and other materials. The 7-inch pliers have insulated handles for safety when working on electrical projects, and feature high leverage for increased gripping power. The pliers have machined jaws for maximum gripping strength, and the slim profile nose reaches into tight areas. The pliers also meet ASTM, IEC, VDE, and DIN specifications for quality and safety.
